request.lesson_description: Introduction to simple machines: Understanding the types (lever, wheel and axle, pulley, inclined plane, wedge, and screw) and their applications in everyday life.
request.learning_standard: NGSS 3-5-ETS1-2: Generate and compare multiple solutions to a problem based on how well they meet the criteria and constraints of a design problem.
request.additional_guidance: Focus on real-world examples such as how pulleys are used in construction, or how levers work in seesaws and crowbars. Include explanations on the mechanical advantage provided by each machine.
